title: The Tick: Karma Tornado, The Complete Works
description: THE KARMA TORNADO THE COMPLETE WORKS256 pages. Contains all nine issues of this classic early Tick series! Continuing our series of 'phonebook' trade paperbacks THE KARMA TORNADO THE COMPLETE WORKS collects all 9 issues of this classic Tick series in its massive 256 pages! Includes an all new editorial by Chris McCulloch, writer/artist of The Karma Tornado, The Tick animated/live action show's writer and creator of Adult Swim's The Venture Brothers.
author: Jackson Publick
